articles.description: Everyone's been wondering if the singer will make it to the game in time after her concert in Tokyo.
articles.content:
Taylor Swift
The Super Bowl is right around the corner, and people everywhere have been asking one burning question about the big game: is Taylor Swift going to make it?
Fans haven't been so sure i… [+2038 chars]
